name: Sota
description:
this is a game of a cube that must find the door to pass the level

How to play with the "a" and "d" buttons you move to the right and left, with "space" you jump, and with the "e" you enter the store to exchange coins for blocks With the mouse you point your shots, with the right click the balls break the blocks and the left you put blocks, with the mouse roller you change blocks, and in the store you slide
